title: Brazilian coconut chicken
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 onion, chopped', '1 tablespoon minced fresh ginger', '2 green chillies, seeded and chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '3 tomatoes, seeded and chopped', '1 (400ml) tin light coconut milk', '1 bunch fresh coriander, chopped']
